review: It was Helpful and good explanation by Dr. Akanksha garu. I would recommend the Hospital and Doctor.

I visited Dr. Balaji on recommedation from a friend, for a tooth extraction. His initial analysis was great and the actual procedure was done in a few minutes. He was kind and patient during my fear of the tooth extraction. He explained every step of the process to me and made me very comfortable. The procedure was done so smoothly that i did not even feel the prick of the anasthesia injection! I would strongly recommend him.

Dr.Balaji and his associate Doctors are friendly and provided an excellent treatment. A homely atmosphere prevailed in the Hospital. Doctor attended me in time. I am satisfied with the treatment. Thanks
Doctor was so friendly and good to me he made me very comfortable treatment was also done without pain
